author: Simon Difford
description: This smooth cocktail beautifully combines vanilla rum with tart wine and the sweetness of the pineapple juice.
name: Palermo
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum (infused with vanilla)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
